name: Webspitter
description:
An entry for the Wowie Jam 2.0 that was made within 72 hours using Unity.

A simple yet somewhat challenging platforming game where you play as a spider capable of shooting out webs that can slow objects and stabilize into platforms that you can walk on. Webspitter involves a web-shooting spider that travels through perilous caverns using his spider abilities to survive.

Consists of a tutorial and two levels (with checkpoints).
